content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All entities in Active Directory must be named in accordance with the rules defined by policy. Please study these rules in \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/SitePages/Policy/Work%20Instructions/Global%20Work%20Instructions/Work%20Instruction%20Resource%20Naming%20Conventions.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Resource naming conventions\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (study p. 2.4 RESOURCE NAMING IN ACTIVE DIRECTORY/EXCHANGE ofÂ  and 2.6 SERVICE ACCOUNTS AND GROUPS) and keep them in mind, while processing requests about creation or renaming of entities in AD (Distribution groups, service accounts, etc.).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All names for newly created AD objects must be approved by Special EPM-GESS AD Object Approvers (members on Enterprise Administration team). Though Service Desk is not eligible to approve the names, our team might act as a consultant and advise requester which group name is more suitable for a specific purpose.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Important!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" In case initially requested name was not approved by Special EPM-GESS AD Object Approvers and they suggested a new name, it must be additionally confirmed with the requester to avoid possible misunderstandings.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}}"
